item.title: Exploring Source Generators in C#: Real-World Examples
item.description: Tired of writing the same class scaffolding over and over? Annoyed by how much time you spend on "glue code" instead of actual features? You're not alone. Imagine if the C# compiler does this on your behalf every time, perfectly. Let me introduce you to C# Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/exploring-source-generators-in-c-real-world-examples/
